title: Enhancing Patient Care Practical Competencies: AI and Ethics in Daily Life: Context-Based Inquiry Course

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy, general understanding of social issues
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain AI fundamentals (e.g., machine learning, data bias) and apply them to three everyday examples.
Learners can propose solutions that consider diverse perspectives in ethical dilemma situations (e.g., hiring algorithms, personal information utilization).
Learners can analyze AI-related social issues and present team-based project reports.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
